ca.mcgill.ecse211.main

Class PollerSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.main.PollerSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class PollerSystem
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Singleton system that creates and manages the polling thread. The primary directive of the poller system is to issue periodic update events to subscribed Poller classes on the polling thread. Poller's can subscribe to polling events by using addPoller(Poller poller).
    Author:
    Brendan Kellam
    See Also:
    Poller
